paths.name: taste-of-riak
paths.title: Taste of Riak
paths.description: An introduction to Riak using Python and HTTP API

modules.name: spec-module
modules.title: Outlearn Package Example
modules.description: An OLP (Outlearn Package) is a directory containing an Outlearn learning module in a format compatible for import into the Outlearn learning catalog.  This example acts as a simple template for creating your own Outlearn modules.
modules._commented: None of this data should be parsed.
